mapper.select: SELECT CODE_CD ,DTL_CD ,DTL_CD_NM FROM MA_CODE_DT WHERE CODE_CD in('SAL_TP_CD' ,'CRD_CO_CD') ORDER BY DTL_CD ASC

SELECT IVCMT.PRT_CD ,IVCMT.PRD_CD ,PRDMT.PRD_NM ,IVCMT.IVCO_QTY ,PRDMT.PRD_CSMR_UPR ,PRDMT.PRD_TP_CD ,PRDMT.TAX_CS_CD ,PRDMT.PRD_SS_CD FROM SD_IVCO01_MT IVCMT LEFT JOIN MA_PRD01_MT PRDMT ON IVCMT.PRD_CD = PRDMT.PRD_CD WHERE 1 =1 AND PRT_CD = #{prt_cd}
and IVCMT.PRD_CD like '%' || #{prd_cd} || '%' or prd_nm like '%' || #{prd_cd} || '%'

SELECT IVCMT.PRT_CD ,IVCMT.PRD_CD ,PRDMT.PRD_NM ,IVCMT.IVCO_QTY ,PRDMT.PRD_CSMR_UPR ,PRDMT.PRD_TP_CD ,PRDMT.TAX_CS_CD ,PRDMT.PRD_SS_CD FROM SD_IVCO01_MT IVCMT LEFT JOIN MA_PRD01_MT PRDMT ON IVCMT.PRD_CD = PRDMT.PRD_CD WHERE 1 =1 AND PRT_CD = #{prt_cd} and IVCMT.PRD_CD = #{prd_cd}

SELECT IVCMT.PRT_CD ,IVCMT.PRD_CD ,PRDMT.PRD_NM ,IVCMT.IVCO_QTY ,PRDMT.PRD_CSMR_UPR ,PRDMT.PRD_TP_CD ,PRDMT.TAX_CS_CD ,PRDMT.PRD_SS_CD FROM SD_IVCO01_MT IVCMT LEFT JOIN MA_PRD01_MT PRDMT ON IVCMT.PRD_CD = PRDMT.PRD_CD WHERE 1 =1 AND PRT_CD = #{prt_cd}
and prd_nm = #{prd_cd}

SELECT SALMT.CUST_NO, SALDT.SAL_NO, SALDT.PRD_CD, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SALDT.SAL_DT,'YYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') SAL_DT, SALDT.PRT_CD, PRDMT.PRD_NM, SALDT.SAL_QTY, SALDT.SAL_AMT, SALMT.SAL_TP_CD, SALMT.TOT_SAL_QTY, SALMT.TOT_VOS_AMT, SALMT.TOT_VAT_AMT, SALMT.TOT_SAL_AMT, SALMT.CSH_STLM_AMT, SALMT.CRD_STLM_AMT FROM CS_SAL01_DT SALDT LEFT JOIN CS_SAL01_MT SALMT ON SALMT.PRT_CD = SALDT.PRT_CD AND SALMT.SAL_DT = SALDT.SAL_DT AND SALMT.SAL_NO = SALDT.SAL_NO LEFT JOIN MA_PRD01_MT PRDMT ON PRDMT.PRD_CD = SALDT.PRD_CD WHERE SALMT.CUST_NO = #{cust_no} AND SALDT.PRT_CD =#{prt_cd} AND SALDT.SAL_DT=#{sal_dt} AND SALDT.SAL_NO=#{sal_no}

SELECT SALMT.PRT_CD, PRTMT.PRT_NM, SALMT.CUST_NO, CUSTMT.CUST_NM, SALMT.TOT_SAL_QTY, SALMT.TOT_SAL_AMT, SALMT.CSH_STLM_AMT, SALMT.CRD_STLM_AMT, SALMT.SAL_TP_CD, SALMT.SAL_NO, SALMT.SAL_DT FROM CS_SAL01_MT SALMT LEFT JOIN CS_CUST01_MT CUSTMT ON SALMT.CUST_NO = CUSTMT.CUST_NO LEFT JOIN MA_PRT_MT PRTMT ON SALMT.PRT_CD = PRTMT.PRT_CD WHERE CUSTMT.CUST_NO = #{cust_no} AND SALMT.PRT_CD =#{prt_cd} AND SALMT.SAL_DT=#{sal_dt} AND SALMT.SAL_NO=#{sal_no}
